contact.title: Contact Information
contact.description: If you prefer to contact us directly, here's our information:

questions.question: What level of Spanish do I need to start?
questions.answer: None! We have courses for all levels, from absolute beginners (A1) to advanced levels (C2). We conduct an initial assessment to place you at the appropriate level.

questions.question: How do online classes work?
questions.answer: Classes are conducted via Zoom with shared interactive material. Our teachers use digital resources and dynamic activities tailored to your specific needs.

questions.question: Can I cancel or reschedule a class?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel or reschedule up to 24 hours before the class at no additional cost. Cancellations with less than 24 hours notice are subject to our cancellation policy.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers. You can choose between monthly plans or class packages according to your needs.
